name: PR_EST_PROFEE_CXT
description: Context information for the professional fees in the price estimate. Context information is used to define the expected circumstances of the charges such as provider and department. Professional fees are generated in Resolute Professional Billing.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the price estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.

columns.name: POS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The place of service (POS) type that is used to provide context for the price estimate's professional fees.
entries: Intermediate Care Facility/ Individuals with Intellectual Disabilities
Telehealth - Provided Other than in Patient's Home

columns.name: VISIT_TYPE_ID_PRC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the visit type.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The benefit service type used to determine benefit information for the professional fees section.  This information comes from the benefit record attached to the estimate. Use the PR_EST_INFO table, BENEFITS_INFO_ID column to link this data.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID_SERVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this benefit service type.

columns.name: PB_DENT_PROC_SUBSTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Status explaining why a procedure is not scheduled. Also groups procedures in the estimates activity and on the letter.

columns.name: PB_LOCATION_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.

columns.name: PRICING_CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the pricing contract.

columns.name: PRICING_CNTR_OVR_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether a user has overridden the pricing contract that is stored in I PES 311. There are two values: 0) No - Contract has been selected by the system. 1) Yes - Contract has been chosen by the user. The default is No.
